name: Burger
description: A classic burger with a juicy beef patty, crispy lettuce, fresh tomato, melted cheese, and creamy mayonnaise on a toasted bun. Served with a side of ketchup or mayonnaise.

name: Fries
description: Crispy, golden fries cooked to perfection. Served with a side of ketchup or mayonnaise.

name: Pizza
description: Freshly baked pizza crust topped with melted mozzarella cheese, tangy tomato sauce, and your choice of toppings. Served with a side of garlic bread.

name: Spaghetti Bolognese
description: Tender spaghetti tossed in a rich, meaty Bolognese sauce made with ground beef, onions, carrots, celery, and tomatoes. Served with a side of garlic bread.

name: Lasagna
description: Layers of pasta, rich meat sauce, and melted mozzarella cheese create a satisfying, filling meal. Served with a side of garlic bread.

name: Chicken wings
description: Crispy fried chicken wings tossed in your choice of sauce: BBQ, Honey Mustard, or Buffalo. Served with a side of ketchup or mayonnaise.

name: Kebab
description: Juicy meat skewers grilled to perfection, served with a side of pita bread, lettuce, tomato, and tzatziki sauce.

name: Meatballs
description: Homemade meatballs made with ground beef, pork, and breadcrumbs, served in a tangy tomato sauce. Served with a side of spaghetti.

name: Shrimp
description: Fresh shrimp cooked in a zesty garlic butter sauce, served with a side of linguine and parsley. Served with a side of garlic bread.

name: Sweet potato fries
description: Sweet potato crispy fries cooked to perfection. Served with a side of ketchup or mayonnaise.

name: Cheeseburger
description: A classic cheeseburger with a juicy beef patty, melted cheese, crispy lettuce, fresh tomato, onion, and a sesame seed bun. Served with a side of ketchup or mayonnaise.

name: Pepperoni Pizza
description: Freshly baked pizza crust topped with melted mozzarella cheese, tangy tomato sauce, and sliced pepperoni. Served with a side of garlic bread.

name: Greek salad
description: A refreshing Greek salad with crispy lettuce, juicy tomatoes, feta cheese, olives, and cucumber. Served with a side of garlic bread.

name: Sushi
description: Assorted sushi rolls made with fresh salmon, tuna, and avocado, served with soy sauce and wasabi. Served with a side of ketchup or mayonnaise.

name: Chicken strips
description: Breaded and fried chicken strips served with a side of tangy dipping sauce. Served with a side of ketchup or mayonnaise.

name: Shrimp scampi
description: Fresh shrimp sautéed in garlic butter and parsley, served with a side of linguine. Served with a side of garlic bread.

name: Tortellini
description: Cheese filled tortellini tossed in a rich cream sauce with a hint of nutmeg. Served with a side of garlic bread.

name: Meatball sub
description: Meatball sub with melted mozzarella cheese, served with a side of marinara sauce. Served with a side of ketchup or mayonnaise.

name: Chicken parmesan
description: Breaded and fried chicken parmesan topped with melted mozzarella cheese and marinara sauce. Served with a side of garlic bread.

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Spaghetti tossed in a rich, creamy sauce made with eggs, parmesan cheese, and crispy bacon. Served with a side of garlic bread.

name: Coca-Cola
description: A refreshing glass of Coca-Cola.

name: Mango smoothie
description: A tropical mango smoothie blended with yogurt and honey.

name: Cheesecake
description: A rich and creamy cheesecake with a graham cracker crust.

name: Pad Thai
description: Stir-fried rice noodles with shrimp, tofu, and vegetables in a sweet and sour sauce.

name: Tacos
description: Soft tacos filled with seasoned beef, lettuce, tomatoes, and cheese. Served with a side of salsa and sour cream.

name: Veggie burger
description: A flavorful veggie burger made with black beans, roasted vegetables, and avocado, served on a toasted bun.

name: Garlic shrimp
description: Fresh shrimp sautéed in garlic butter and parsley, served with a side of linguine.

name: Fanta
description: A refreshing glass of Fanta orange soda.

description: A hot cup of coffee.

description: A large burrito filled with seasoned beef, rice, beans, and cheese, topped with salsa and sour cream.
